headline: Think It's Too Late to Buy Verizon? Here's the Biggest Reason Why There's Still Time.
summary: Verizon (NYSE: VZ) has gone on a nice run over the past several quarters.  You might be wondering if it's too late to invest in Verizon.  Verizon has spent the past several years investing heavily in building out faster 5G and fiber networks to better compete with rivals like AT&T. That heavy investment phase put some pressure on its balance sheet as its leverage ratio rose.
